text: The 2021 BWF World Junior Championships, is the twenty-third edition of the BWF World Junior Championships. It will be held in Chengdu, China. ==Host city selection== China was awarded the event in November 2018 during the announcement of 18 major badminton event hosts from 2019 to 2025. Chengdu was named on July 2020 as the bidding city and accepted as the host for the event. ==References== Category:BWF World Junior Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by China Category:Badminton tournaments in China BWF World Junior Championships BWF World Junior BWF World Junior
title: 2021 BWF World Junior Championships
